items.desc: MIAMI _ Seeking to mend tattered relations with his opposition and the international community , Haiti 0027s president-elect , Jean-Bertrand Aristide , has assured President Clinton that he is committed to a broad range of governmental and political reforms , including a runoff for 10 contested Senate seats that had caused an electoral crisis .
